org.openimaj.tools.twitter.options

Class AbstractTwitterPreprocessingToolOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.tools.InOutToolOptions
      • org.openimaj.tools.twitter.options.AbstractTwitterPreprocessingToolOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HadoopTwitterPreprocessingToolOptions, TwitterPreprocessingToolOptions

    public abstract class AbstractTwitterPreprocessingToolOptions
extends InOutToolOptions
    An abstract kind of twitter processing tool. Contains all the options generic to this kind of tool, not dependant on files or hadoop or whatever.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
